mapper.insert:
insert into cart values(null, #{amount}, #{goodsNo}, #{memberNo})
select last_insert_id()
mapper.select: select cart.no, goods.name, goods.price, goods.rate_sale as rateSale, cart.amount, c.optionList, c.nameList, d.path from goods inner join cart on goods.no = cart.goods_no left join (select cart_option.cart_no, group_concat(convert(small_option.no, char(8))) as optionList, group_concat(small_option.name) as nameList from cart_option inner join small_option on cart_option.small_option_no = small_option.no group by cart_option.cart_no) as c on cart.no = c.cart_no left join (select goods_no, path from goods_image group by goods_no) d on cart.goods_no = d.goods_no where cart.member_no = #{_parameter}
